module.name: condition_evaluation
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a record of the evaluation of a condition.

inscope.li: identification of the evaluation of a condition specified by a textual description that resulted in a logical;
recording of parameter values evaluated and the logical result of the evaluation.

outscope.li: identification of the evaluation of a condition that is not specified by a textual description;
identification of the evaluation of a condition with a non-logical result;
characterization of the evaluation of a condition;
the computation or conversion of parameter values.
